full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RGYAL PO GTAM BYA BA RIN PO CHE'I PHRENG BA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @065A*, ,(RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO BIDY'A @065B K'AR BRA BH'A DANG, BOD KYI LO TZ'A PA PANDE DPAL BRTZEGS KYIS BSGYUR CING ZHUS TE GTAN LA PHAB PA'O, ,SLAD KYIS RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO SH'I KA NA KA WARMA DANG, BOD KYI BANDE PA TSAB NYI MA GRAGS KYIS RGYA DPE GSUM LA GTUGS NAS, 'PHAGS PA YAB SRAS KYI DGONGS PA THUN MONG MA YIN PA DANG MI MTHUN PAR BSGYUR BA LA SOGS PA BCOS SHING GTAN LA PHAB PA'O,, ,,AOm SVA STI, THUB PA'I GSUNG SNYING SDE SNOD KUN GYI PHUL, ,YUM CHEN SHER PHYIN DNGOS BSTAN STONG RIM TSUL, ,THUB DGONGS JI BZHIN DRANG NGES 'BYED PA'I GZHUNG, ,RIGS TSOGS DRUG CES LEGS BSHAD NOR BU'I GTER, ,THUB BSTAN SGO BRGYA MA LUS PHYE PHYIR DU, ,LUNG RIGS SMRA BA YE SHES BLO LDAN GYIS, ,MI PHYED DAD PAS MTHUN RKYEN LEGS SBYAR TE, ,DBU MA'I GZHUNG LUGS 'DI NYID DPAR DU BSGRUBS, ,DGE BA 'DI YIS TSE RABS THAMS CAD DU, ,YONGS 'DZIN DGE BA'I BSHES KYIS RJES SU BZUNG, ,MDO RGYUD ZAB MO'I LAM KUN NYAMS KLANGS NAS, ,'GRO KUN SANGS RGYAS SA LA 'GOD PAR GYUR CIG , CES AA BHA G'A CANG CUN T'A WANG GI SHOG RAB 'BYAMS PA YE SHES BLO LDAN GYIS MTHUN RKYEN SBYAR TE, DBU MA RIGS PA'I TSOGS DRUG CHOS GRVA CHEN PO SKU 'BUM BYAMS PA GLING DU DPAR DU BSGRUBS PA'I DPAR BYANG SMON TSIG 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL NGOR, MTSO SNGON KHUR LUGS TSVAL 'DAM SHOG BYA BRAL LHA RAM MING BSHAD SGRUB NYI MAS BRIS PA'O,, ,,)
translator_(орчуулагч): BIDY'A K'AR BRA GH'A, DPAL BRTZEGS, SH'I KA NA KA WARMA, PA TSAB NYI MA GRAGS,
